title: Band, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: linen and horsehair
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop & twist with twist return
provenance: ex-collection: Countess Valencia de Don Juan
dimensions: H x W: 11.5 x 170 cm (4 1/2 in. x 5 ft. 6 15/16 in.); repeat: 2 inches
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Scalloped border of Point d'Alençon in a pattern of repeated floral spray pattern on réseau ordinaire. Dotted with tear-shaped leaves – semé de larmes (sown of tears). Modes: Point Mignon, enchainettes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, early 19th century.Medium: linen and horsehair
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop & twist with twist return. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-40.
